definition: Zhenyuan county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to distance oneself from (classical)
Zhenyuan county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

sentences.english: Zhenyuan ordained at East Bridge in rivers and mountains, was built in the Ming Dynasty Hongwu years.
sentences.chinese: 位於鎮遠縣城東中河山，始建於明朝洪武年間。

sentences.english: Zhenyuan county government did not answer calls today.
sentences.chinese: 今天鎮遠縣政府沒有人接聽電話。

sentences.english: This photo was taken in Zhenyuan, Guizhou Province, China this summer.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片拍攝於今年夏季的貴州鎮遠。

sentences.english: And Warship Zhenyuan was wounded after striking a reef and it finally surrendered and put into Japanese Navy.
sentences.chinese: 而鎮遠則因觸礁受損，最後投降編入日本海軍。
